virtual-sensor.name: WundergroundDailyET
virtual-sensor.description: Daily virtual sensor for Wunderground KSBA station. ET parameters. Needs API key. Runs twice a day.

source.query: select _____history__dailysummary__0____meanpressurem as meanpressure, _____history__dailysummary__0____maxtempm as maxtemp, _____history__dailysummary__0____minpressurem as minpressure , _____history__dailysummary__0____mindewptm as mindewpt , _____history__dailysummary__0____meandewptm as meandewpt, _____history__dailysummary__0____precipm as precipm, _____history__dailysummary__0____humidity as humidity, _____history__dailysummary__0____maxhumidity as maxhumidity, _____history__dailysummary__0____meantempm as meantemp, _____history__dailysummary__0____maxwspdm as maxwspdm, _____history__dailysummary__0____maxpressurem as maxpressure, _____history__dailysummary__0____date__pretty as date, _____history__dailysummary__0____minwspdm as minwspd, _____history__dailysummary__0____mintempm as mintemp, _____history__dailysummary__0____maxdewptm as maxdewpt, _____history__dailysummary__0____rain as rain, _____history__dailysummary__0____minhumidity as minhumidity, _____history__dailysummary__0____meanwdire as meanwdire, _____history__dailysummary__0____meanwindspdm as meanwindspd, _____history__dailysummary__0____meanwdird as meanwdird, date_of_measurement from wrapper
